website_summaries.verdict: Conveniently designed with a number of helpful accessories, this pair is perfect if you are looking for a comprehensive grooming tool.
pros: Comes with a glove specifically designed for de-shedding, as well as with a separate grooming glove
Includes adjustable wrist straps to fit most hand sizes
Grooming glove is especially helpful for bathing
cons: Pets do not enjoy the massage as well as with other gloves, as this pair's rubber can feel a little  firm

customer_reviews.title: every five-star review of this product is a lie
customer_reviews.text: I bought these earmuffs because reviews said they were good quality, warm, comfortable. I got them and was unpleasantly surprised to find that they were made of perhaps a piece of clothing hanger and two pieces of fabric. perhaps acceptable if one were desperate, but incredibly cheap and junky. especially for $9. a few weeks later, I received a letter from the seller saying that if I left a five-star review, they would send me a gift card for $10! imagine that! producing a garbage product and then BUYING good reviews! so I'm leaving this ONE-star review and a warning to other shoppers-- this product sucks and these sellers are scumbags. spend your dollars on a different pair of earmuffs.
customer_reviews.author: Theresa Copeland

customer_reviews.title: It’s like a coat hanger wrapped in foam
customer_reviews.text: I guess you get what you pay for! Going to try and send these back. They are cheaply made, the size is not adjustable, and it’s literally like a coat hanger wrapped in fabric with foam by the ears. If you live where winter is mild they may work but not in Chicago windy winters.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Solid product. Fits my big giant head
customer_reviews.text: I've got a big pumpkin head and dumbo ears. These things are great. There's enough flex in the inner steel band to mold it so it perfectly clings to your head. The "muff" part that covers your ears is oversize-so you're not going to move wrong and have it slip off. They are nice and plush inside. They cut down the wind and cold without interfering with your hearing at all Bonus: they're perfect to wear under a ponytail, or your hair if you leave it down
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: do not understand good reviews
customer_reviews.text: these cost very little but the cheapness of them quality wise makes the $8 exorbitant; they don't even touch your ears, there is such a gap they would do absolutely no good
customer_reviews.author: c clark

customer_reviews.title: AWFUL!
customer_reviews.text: If I could give this 0 stars I would. If you want CHEAP and ILLFITTING ear muffs that are poor quality - then these are for you! These are awful. They are huge. They do not fold up nicely. I can't actually find one nice thing to say about them.
customer_reviews.author: RL

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your $
customer_reviews.text: This thing is total trash and feels flimsy and bulky..cannot store in pocket. Don’t know where all these 5 star reviews are coming from. I’m returning mine
customer_reviews.author: annafi c.

customer_reviews.title: Better than I imagined for a long haired cat!
customer_reviews.text: I can't even believe how well the darker blue glove worked on my long hair cat, she never let's me near her with a regular brush. She loved this and it took off so much hair to make half a cat! Now I can worry less about her dying of a fur filled stomach. The other gloves rubber side didn't work well for her, but I bet it will on my short haired. It is worth getting the duo just for the lint brush side of the paw glove, it picked up the whole mess!
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: it is overkill for Texas
customer_reviews.text: I bought it earlier on in the winter because i have a short walk from the parking lot to my work place. I have used it maybe twice and it has served me well. But then I live in Texas which does not have winter just mild summer - today (early-Feb) it is going to be in the 80s - WTH... Quality wise, good value for money. Don't know if it will last for next season or I will end up losing it somewhere in the house because it did not get much use.
customer_reviews.author: madnad

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed in size and function
customer_reviews.text: Don't expect these earmuffs to perform like 180's. They are GIGANTIC. They do not fold in like 180's - the smallest they get is exactly how they are pictured. They also feel line they are going to pop off - because you can't wear them too long before they DO pop off. I bought others like this and paid the same price for 4 pairs as I dod for one of these. Those fold in a little better and are nowhere near as huge as these.
customer_reviews.author: MireilleTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Warm and cozy!
customer_reviews.text: My husband requested a new set of earmuffs for work which is farming. I chose these from the reviews stating they were a little larger and warmer than most. Upon arriving, he decided they were too "nice" to use for work and he would keep them for good. He was thoroughly impressed with these earmuffs and each time he wears them, he states it again. They cover his ears entirely and very warm which he needs/wants. Score.
customer_reviews.author: Mary  "macraw"

customer_reviews.title: Cat approved!
customer_reviews.text: My Ginger kitty isn't a fan of regular brushes, but she loved her massage with the blue fingered glove. She let me brush her for 10 minutes which netted the removal of the huge ball of fur you see in the pictures. My 21 year old kitty Mouse Cat loved being brushed with the glove also. Sake isn't so sure. We will try again with Sake later :) The reason for the 4 stars is none of my kitties liked the paw glove. This glove seems like it would be more effective on a dog.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Warm and Snug
customer_reviews.text: The one-size-fits-all concerned me, but these fit my medium-small head just fine. If I turn them "upside down" they are larger. I don't think there is really a way to determine which is right-side-up or upside-down... so that might be part of the one-size design. I'm very happy with these, and they are preventing my cold-weather ear ache. They also allow me to bun my hair, which is an amazing plus.
customer_reviews.author: Maestro

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, but doesn't cup the ears
customer_reviews.text: The materials used for the product are excellent, I could see this standing up to multiple winters' use, but around the ears there is no 'bowl' or cup--it doesn't enclose the ear, it rests on it for the most part (and any sort of physical activity makes it tend to slide off--you couldn't wear these jogging). It is quite possible as it is worn over time it will 'wear in' and stay on better: if that is the case I will adjust my review.
customer_reviews.author: Lucas G

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the price.  A+++
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE these ear muffs, simply because they are not all fuzzy and don't make your ears sweat. I love the size where they cover the whole ear, plus some. They are not real flimsy like some where they fall apart right away around the back, but they are sturdy enough to stay around your head and cover the main part, the EARS. y ears are very sensitive so this is an A+++ product in my books.
customer_reviews.author: Renee S

customer_reviews.title: Absolute junk
customer_reviews.text: I was taken in by a lower price - I admit it - but these are junk. Not even worth the money I did pay. They are flimsy, they are not adjustable, they are thin. All around cheap-looking and feeling. They are way too big for my head. Not even worth the hassle of returning. They are going right into the garbage. Save your money. Get the "real" ear warmers.
customer_reviews.author: GyngerT

customer_reviews.title: If u live in Illinois this is a must have
customer_reviews.text: Im so excited about this. It shipped fast and got here in perfect timing. As it just started to snow here today. Got it for my husband as he wakes 30 minutes approximately on his way from parking lot to work. Looks good and does the trick.
customer_reviews.author: Dede

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for winter
customer_reviews.text: Very warm, I think they'll be perfect for winter. I like theaw cuz they wrap around the neck rather than like a headband which is awesome for my sensitive head! I will say I'm a bit disappointed in the color. I ordered grey (which I didn't read) I went by the color on the photo which looks more like a real or very light green color. What I got is definitely grey so if that's what you're looking for it's a very pretty light grey! Just not what I thought it was going to be. Other than that the product is very nice quality and seems like it will hold up very nicely!
customer_reviews.author: Cree

customer_reviews.title: Perfect ear muffs
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to use at my daughter's softball games in the winter. Usually, ear muffs don't fit well over my curly hair or they're too dense to hear through. These are perfect! They keep my ears warm. They wrap underneath my hair instead of over. And I can hear perfectly through them.
customer_reviews.author: Tanya

customer_reviews.title: Awkward fit, but effective for keeping my ears warm.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for a trip to Canada with expected subzero (F) temperatures. I had trouble getting them to fit around my head comfortably, but they did keep my ears warm and did not muffle sound too much to hear well. I think if it were possible to adjust them for a better fit, they'd be the perfect pair of earmuffs.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Anne Fisher

customer_reviews.title: Messy cleanup
customer_reviews.text: Thie big paw glove is not good for kitties however the hand glove works OK. You have to get alot of fur off your kitty to peel it off otherwise it is awful to get the fur out of the mitt. You will understand if you buy this. Only 1 of my kitties will allow me to use the mitt the other one must think it's too harsh because she absolutely hisses and gets upset when I bring it out. The cleanup off the mitt is why I have it 3 stars otherwise I have pretty picky fur babies so their judegement of things is not weighed heavily at all. The big mitt works well on dogs.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy Huffman

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these as stocking stuffers. When they arrived, I tried them on and I found them to be tight and uncomfortable. I have had the brand name ones before and they adjusted to fit the head better. Sometimes a cheap knock off is just that. Maybe if someone had a smaller head, it would fit better.
customer_reviews.author: AEW

customer_reviews.title: Shipped Quick and are Very nice to wear
customer_reviews.text: Nice material washable and line dry over night , fits all the family members needing a mask. My son works in a processing plant and likes to wear this over his small mask . Like that they have various patterns. Even my grand daughter likes the blue camo one for her .
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Gavala

customer_reviews.title: It's not as easy to clean & it get's messy when trying to remove hair. Hair sticks to side of glove
customer_reviews.text: It's not as easy to clean & it get's messy when trying to remove hair. Hair sticks to side of glove on just the material part. We bought these for our Maine Coon and Chihuahua. The glove does an okay job and the mitt doesn't do much at all. I found that if you let the hair build up on the glove that it makes it a little less messy to remove.
customer_reviews.author: Whitt

customer_reviews.title: ear muffs
customer_reviews.text: I found the ear muffs hard to wear the band go's around the back of the head. I have not had ear muffs since 1965 so there are different than what I wear back when I was a kid. I do like how warm they are and I can hear people talking or the tv or radio when I wear them. for the cost there good.
customer_reviews.author: sandra

customer_reviews.title: Like the earth, my ears are not flat!
customer_reviews.text: My reaction upon first removing these from the package: "What the #%&??.. Really? " If i were some kind of extraterrestrial alien with just holes on both sides of my head instead of actual ears these might work. Being that I happen to be human, these flat earmuffs do me no good.
customer_reviews.author: A morning person

customer_reviews.title: Windproof and a great fit!
customer_reviews.text: I love these! They keep my ears from getting cold and hurting in the wind. I tried hats and headbands, but they don’t cover my ears, and they push on my glasses. Very comfortable and stay put. Lightweight. You hardly know they’re up there. They work just fine with my earbuds, too.
customer_reviews.author: A. M.

customer_reviews.title: So far my dog is fooled and doesn't realize she's being groomed
customer_reviews.text: My dog is a scruffy adorable fluffy ragamuffin who runs every time I pull out a brush. Well the glove so far has confused her. She's getting some petting which she obviously loves but she's not quite sure what to make of the weird hand mommy puts on. So for now we will say they are doing the job, taming her mane and I don't have to chase her down to use them. In fact here she comes now for some glove brushing love.
customer_reviews.author: SbNYC

customer_reviews.title: Her fur is growing back nicely now. This was great for a cat with ...
customer_reviews.text: My cat has severe flea allergies; her skin gets scaly and she pulls her fur out. Once I got rid of the flea (yeah, just one to cause all this misery), her fur was coming back soo slowly, and she couldn't tolerate her usual brush. The grooming glove let me start working on loosening the scales and massaged her skin. Her fur is growing back nicely now. This was great for a cat with thinned out fur.
customer_reviews.author: Friday007

customer_reviews.title: Larger than expected
customer_reviews.text: Even though these ear muffs were larger than expected ... The performance and comfort in frigid conditions here in Colorado is A plus ! I bought two muffs in blue and tan , then bought the black one to complete my look ... NICE !
customer_reviews.author: Todd Shearer

customer_reviews.title: So much hair comes out!
customer_reviews.text: These things really work! I really like the glove the most. My dogs even like it I get so much hair out! My dogs actually walk into the shower now as opposed to me dragging them. We have two labs and they shed like crazy. These things work better than going to a groomer. I tried to do it monthly but that doesn’t always happen.
customer_reviews.author: Carl

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: Hig ear warmer stays in place, is very comfortable and soft. I purchased one for my daughter because she has ear pain from wind and cold weather. We spend a lot of time outside and exercise in windy and cold weather. This ear warmer was exactly what she needed. It completely covers and protects her ears from wind and cold air!!! My daughter loves it and I highly recommend this ear warmer!!!
customer_reviews.author: Cathy O

customer_reviews.title: Warm and happy!
customer_reviews.text: I love these ear warmers I have been having problems this winter with my ears getting cold. These are prefect lightweight and cover my ears however, I can still hear what’s going on around me. I have them in every color!
customer_reviews.author: mskatt

customer_reviews.title: glove works, mitt not so much
customer_reviews.text: The glove works really, really well on my med-hair cat, but the mitt doesn't work well at all. Unfortunately, the glove seam on the side of the thumb has opened, so it doesn't look like it was sewn together very well. It still works, but doesn't stay immobile on my hand as well as it should.
customer_reviews.author: clrtwallace

customer_reviews.title: Nice and toasty
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for an upcoming trip to Colorado. They kept my ears warm, when I didn't want to keep my hood on my coat. I also use then now that i'm back home and the cold weather is hitting and the wind is whipping.
customer_reviews.author: Portia

customer_reviews.title: Dumbo Sized and terrible quality
customer_reviews.text: What a joke these are. Absolutely Huge, not adjustable or foldable. Will not stay on ears. Made of coat hanger wire, some cheap foam and flimsy fleece. Quality is laughable. A complete rip-off. Returned immediately.
customer_reviews.author: Emmief

customer_reviews.title: They work great, but
customer_reviews.text: They are so big, and want to uncurl in my pocket, that I put mine in a sock to keep them contained. They’re great at keeping my ears, and a good part of my head, very warm when I’m out in the cool. Very worth the money compared to the competition.
customer_reviews.author: C. Burke

customer_reviews.title: Cheap and thin
customer_reviews.text: Yucky and cheap. Very thin, and you can feel the wires all through it. The ear covers are big, which is good...but I think they’re almost too big. I decided to buy another pair that I like a lot better.
customer_reviews.author: PR

customer_reviews.title: Kid wears them
customer_reviews.text: I bought them for my 13 year old son, he didn't want to wear a hat and mess up his hair. LOL He wears these every day to the buss stop, says sometimes his ears get too warm. They stay on great.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy

customer_reviews.title: Warm but very over-sized
customer_reviews.text: In my 60 years I have never had a problem with headwear or believed my head was anything but standard sized. These are soft and warm, but large, and the internal spring or whatever is too weak to maintain position.
customer_reviews.author: Sheba Silver Spring

customer_reviews.title: If you don't like regular ear muffs these may be for you!
customer_reviews.text: I love how these fit, they protect my ears quite well from the cold. I have never done well with traditional fitting ear muffs, as they would tend to slide off a bit, and I don't like the band going across the top of my head. These are perfect, and will be buying more in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Carol Thurstin

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these ear warmers for my boyfriend as we are planning a trip up to NY this Christmas. I was disappointed upon receiving them to see that they do not appear to be good quality. I tried them on and they did not fit snuggly/slipped down easily. The material on the inside of the ear muffs looks like it would be warm, but the leather on the outside looks cheap. Unfortunately, this was not what we were looking for and probably should have be weary considering the price!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy this item
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this item for our granddaughter and it would not stay on her head. I tried the thing and guess what it would not stay on my head. I adjusted and readjusted with negative results.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Everton

customer_reviews.title: Warm
customer_reviews.text: These are very warm, but larger than I expected. They seem to overpower my head - but really keep my ears warm when I use them! Until I find a style a bit smaller, I will continue to use these.
customer_reviews.author: TS

customer_reviews.title: Warmth
customer_reviews.text: They seems kind of flimsy once I received them, but they were great. I took them with me on a trip to Philly and they kept me so warm. I would definitely recommend purchasing these.
customer_reviews.author: Kiba

customer_reviews.title: Keeps you toasty warm in below zero temps
customer_reviews.text: Very warm hat! With below zero temperatures and the wind chill factor down in the minus 20's this hat keeps you toasty warm. The only negative issue we've found is sometimes the face mask rides up which can be annoying. The hat is well constructed of quality materials. There are no loose threads anywhere and it is holding up very well. Highly recommended if you are looking for a warm, well made hat.
customer_reviews.author: Debby Tauer

customer_reviews.title: Nice product but slips sometimes from ears
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves his ear warmers but I felt it was slipping away while being worn. Soft and light but not as comfortable as I would have wanted it to be.
customer_reviews.author: Anumol MT

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: I have large white labordoodle, and yes some shed. These removed hair and he did not mind being stroked but it is quite difficult to remove the hair from the gloves. I would not buy again or recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Diane M

customer_reviews.title: 2-pak that won’t hurt the wallet
customer_reviews.text: This came in a 2 pack. Very inexpensive for a 2-pack. Fits my husbands head very well and he loves them. Perfect for outdoor activities or working in the cold.
customer_reviews.author: PB&J

customer_reviews.title: Soft
customer_reviews.text: These fit great and keep my ears so warm! They are also very soft! Perfect for the cold weather we get here in Colorado!
customer_reviews.author: vickie rumbold

customer_reviews.title: Good product for the price and warm.
customer_reviews.text: Not as heavy as I would have liked but they are really warm and a bit big on me. I misplaced my first pair so I bought a second pair. Really good value.
customer_reviews.author: Estelle L Diamond

customer_reviews.title: Sizing off?
customer_reviews.text: Bought two of these and they were just too loose and wouldn’t stay on mine or my husbands ears. They looked good but had to return due to the sizing
customer_reviews.author: Carie

customer_reviews.title: What the snowwoman needed!
customer_reviews.text: Wife lost her last warmers recently. Could not find at local retail stores. Found your site and ordered. Now wife is happy with her warm ears! Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Razorback Fan

customer_reviews.title: Great for cold days.
customer_reviews.text: Needed something to cover ears on cold days. These worked great, very comfortable. Needed these for working outside on cold days and playing golf.
customer_reviews.author: PK

customer_reviews.title: Not flexible, not good for small heads, terrible craftsmanship
customer_reviews.text: These were terrible. Felt hard like cardboard, not able to adjust/twist to position easily, felt uncomfortable to wear, and did not cover my ears well against the cold. Returned this item.
customer_reviews.author: Starling04

customer_reviews.title: HIG mistake
customer_reviews.text: Ok, guys, they function and they are warm but the style/sizing is a little different than expected in person. Idk if anyone else experienced this but after puttng them on and getting a good look, they look like poorly-manufactured, ill-fitting, circa 2000 headphones. Unfortunately, will not be returning since they are in fact so cheap and maybe I shouldn't complain but I think Walmart probably makes better looking ones for the same price. 🤷
customer_reviews.author: Cara

customer_reviews.title: Soft and warm
customer_reviews.text: Very soft and warm. Love that they are compact and fit in a pocket. Would be great for someone with a bit wider head then mine! Great customer service!
customer_reviews.author: Jollyholiday7

customer_reviews.title: Must Have!
customer_reviews.text: Well made product that will be much used in this colder weather. Have had problems with prior ear muffs staying in place, but these ones are great!
customer_reviews.author: Sonya C.

customer_reviews.title: Very nice and warm in hours outside
customer_reviews.text: They are so comfortable, I love these ear warmers. Everyone know how cold is Michigan, and I'm working outside for hours, but now with this ear warmers, I never get cold. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Ahmad

customer_reviews.title: Very cheap.
customer_reviews.text: Very cheaply made. They made a crunching sound when you put them on and the metal on the ears was not flexible at all. Returned.
customer_reviews.author: Buckeye

customer_reviews.title: Works, but not optimal
customer_reviews.text: These do their job keeping ears warm, but they are very big and clunky and the tag placement was unfortunate and itched my neck.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Ann

customer_reviews.title: Color much darker than pictured
customer_reviews.text: Color not as pictured. Very dark brown, almost black. That said, function & comfort & warmth, not to mess price, all great.
customer_reviews.author: kate

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing, don't work
customer_reviews.text: They're huge and don't stay in place. They should be cupped instead of flat so they stay in and actually warm your ears.
customer_reviews.author: Amelia C

customer_reviews.title: Extra large ear coverage.
customer_reviews.text: These things are huge and don't clamp onto my head properly. I'll try them out in the winter and reevaluate.
customer_reviews.author: mark

customer_reviews.title: Quality is great,
customer_reviews.text: Love it,is confurble to wear and stay in place, I'll buy another one, different color of course, thank you for creating this product.
customer_reviews.author: lorenasolante

customer_reviews.title: Great product, wrong color.
customer_reviews.text: I really like these but apparently picking a color just doesn't matter. I ordered gray and received black.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela M McNew

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed; Huge; like wearing a saucer on each side of your head.
customer_reviews.text: I have always worn ear muffs because my ears are very sensitive to cold and wind. I was extremely disappointed when I pulled out one to try on and found it ridiculously large. I measured an older ear muff and they measured about 3 inches wide, however, these measures 5 inches wide.
customer_reviews.author: Chris N

customer_reviews.title: Not adjustable
customer_reviews.text: These are NOT adjustable. They work okay, but I’ve ordered another pair that are adjustable and that fold up .
customer_reviews.author: Catherine

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: They are very stylish and comfortable, love then I can wear them with my security uniform and still be in compliance.
customer_reviews.author: SueParrett

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable and cozy. Exactly the one I looking for. I will order one more... Best Buy with great price and good quality
customer_reviews.author: Meenu

customer_reviews.title: Would not stay up
customer_reviews.text: Impossible to wear and keep over ears without constantly adjusting. I tried bending them in so that they would wear correctly but it's just a poor design.
customer_reviews.author: Kiersten

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for the price
customer_reviews.text: My sons are 36 and 30. One has a round head. The other has an oblong head. The ear muffs fit both .
customer_reviews.author: patricia

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made
customer_reviews.text: I knew these were larger from the pictures other customer posted, but the quality of these is so bad. Very cheaply made. Unfortunately, I had to return them.
customer_reviews.author: Uniquegrl

customer_reviews.title: GREAT !!!!!!! KEEPS YOU WARM.
customer_reviews.text: You must buy this garment for your head. It keeps you warm all over your head. People make fun of me here in Miami Beach watching movies outside in the open every Wednesday. When the wind blows from the ocean and it is in the 50's everyone then wanted to have one for themselves. If it keeps me warm, just think how warm it feels being used in the cold weather up north.
customer_reviews.author: Nikola Tesla

customer_reviews.title: They are not adjustable and way to big
customer_reviews.text: I did not like the warmers. They are not adjustable in the back and they are way to big. I’m actually retuning them.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie N Schafrath

customer_reviews.title: Warm.
customer_reviews.text: Very warm. These things are pretty big, but they work well and it keeps my ears warm in a cold Boston winter.
customer_reviews.author: Mateo Castro

customer_reviews.title: ... now for about the last week and I feel like I have been able to notice a difference
customer_reviews.text: I have been wearing these glasses now for about the last week and I feel like I have been able to notice a difference. I feel like my brain and body start to slow down easier to help me fall asleep faster and easier. I’m excited to see how this next week goes and how hopefully my sleep with not only improve but hopefully increase.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen M. Cefalo

customer_reviews.title: Does not smash your head and are really soft
customer_reviews.text: Love how these don’t smash the top of my head and they are so soft. Fits my head and my sons perfect.
customer_reviews.author: ashley jurgensmeier

customer_reviews.title: Very good Product
customer_reviews.text: Just what I wanted. My daughter's first pair were stolen a Georgetown in DC so hopefully she'll take great care of these since those winters are absolutely nothing like these in the deep south
customer_reviews.author: Tracy C Nord

customer_reviews.title: Won't go wrong if you buy these
customer_reviews.text: Good fit and nice and warm. Made very good gifts.
customer_reviews.author: cki

customer_reviews.title: Will keep your ears warm
customer_reviews.text: I like that there not regular ear warmers that are uncomfortable there actually comfy and they keep my ears warm
customer_reviews.author: Dezaray Durrance

customer_reviews.title: These grooming gloves work great. The glove with the fingers is a size ...
customer_reviews.text: These grooming gloves work great. The glove with the fingers is a size medium and the other one is a medium/large. I wasn't able to brush my cats because they would grab and bite the brush. They don't even know they are being brushed now. Its like they are getting a massage. :)
customer_reviews.author: Shimmer

customer_reviews.title: For my husband
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my husband and he likes them so far. It keeps his ears warm.
customer_reviews.author: Lorilbs

customer_reviews.title: I wish they were adjustable.
customer_reviews.text: I always thought I had a big head, but these were sliding down my cheeks. They were soft and seemed comfortable, but I had to return them because of the fit.
customer_reviews.author: mountaineer

customer_reviews.title: Get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: The item was too short which caused it rest in an arkward position of the neck.
customer_reviews.author: Robin Douglas

customer_reviews.title: Very large, but warm
customer_reviews.text: These are HUGE. Weirdly huge. But faux fur inside really does keep your ears warm. I kept them, but I really wish they were smaller.
customer_reviews.author: Biki

customer_reviews.title: Warm and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: The design is great, initially I thought it’s big but it works amazingly well even in 20F
customer_reviews.author: Anuj Dalal

customer_reviews.title: Great Warmth Great Value
customer_reviews.text: These comfortably fit a man who doesn't have the smallest head, are surprisingly warm for such a good value.
customer_reviews.author: Ame Ashg

customer_reviews.title: Needs Additional features
customer_reviews.text: Warm Earmuffs are good size for big ears, but it is not full puffy to stop cold air. Other issue is it is not foldable. So you need hold it all the time in your hands instead of keeping in pockets. Foldable option may give customers more flexibility.
customer_reviews.author: Komal Kumar

customer_reviews.title: Work great
customer_reviews.text: I am impressed with these ear muffs. The work great and are reasonably priced
customer_reviews.author: Dakota

customer_reviews.title: Works well for child and adults
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my young daughter durning cheer. These helped keep her ears super warm durning games and the Christmas parades. They also fit her and me, so a child and adult, so either one of us can wear them when needed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super cheap.
customer_reviews.text: Cheap product, would not really fit great. Couldn’t really use in Chicago.
customer_reviews.author: Nai

customer_reviews.title: Great ear warmers!
customer_reviews.text: These are very warm. Covers the entire ear and doesn't slide. Great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Karen W. Noe

customer_reviews.title: ... for our adopted Rottweiler who did not seem to like our other brush
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for our adopted Rottweiler who did not seem to like our other brush. He loved getting rubbed down with and our other dog got jelious and wanted in. The desheder works great the other one is just ok.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fast shipping
customer_reviews.text: They are a lot bigger than expected. The fur lining tickles my ears.
customer_reviews.author: Celecia Dibble

customer_reviews.title: NICE!!
customer_reviews.text: It really does work! Unfortunately hair gets all over the glove itself, and I had to pick it off...but, as you can see in the pictures, it DOES groom away hair and peels off easily.
customer_reviews.author: GMAX215

customer_reviews.title: These ear warmers are a game changer!
customer_reviews.text: These ear warmers are soft, comfortable, and warm! Much needed for walking the dog or outdoor recess duty! They fit into my coat pocket and are ready whenever I need them!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Writtenberry

customer_reviews.title: Amazing.
customer_reviews.text: I hate hats this keeps me warm like I'm wearing one.
customer_reviews.author: Rachelle King

customer_reviews.title: Bad Fit
customer_reviews.text: Too thin. Do not snug against ear at all. Guess that is why they were so cheap.
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda Turner

customer_reviews.title: Warm and snug
customer_reviews.text: This is my second pair of muffs and just like the other pair they keep my ears warm and protected from the wind and cold!!
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Wurthmann

customer_reviews.title: Fashionable and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: These earmuffs are super warm and very comfortable. I’m very glad I chose these. They also look great!
customer_reviews.author: Sloan the Great

product_meta.title: HIG Ear Warmers for Men & Women Classic Fleece Unisex Winter Warm Earmuffs
feature_bullets: Warm & Windproof - Ultra-soft Plush Faux Furry Material to Protect your ears, effective windproof keep warm in cold winters
One size fits most men and women, Suitable for all ages
Widely Use - Perfect for hiking biking skiing hunting travel running skating in cold winter

Fashion to wear - It is fashionable to wear this ear warmer from the back of your neck instead of wearing it on top of head ones. pure color, simple and classical design, and exquisite packaging. our winter earmuff is great to match your any style.
After sales service: If you are not satisfied with our product, please contact us and we’ll give you a satisfied answer without any additional conditions. All issues will be solved within 24 hours
